H0.text: The rivers Trent and Ouse flow into which estuary. Thames Estuary

H1.text: The rivers Trent and Ouse flow into which estuary. Severn Estuary

H2.text: The rivers Trent and Ouse flow into which estuary. Mersey Estuary

H3.text: The rivers Trent and Ouse flow into which estuary. Humber

A4.text: It is formed at Trent Falls, Faxfleet, by the confluence of the tidal rivers Ouse and Trent.
